all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Yea, open your mouths and spare not, and you shall be laden with sheaves upon your backs, for lo, I am with you.
Doctrine and Covenants 33:9
Quote of the Day
"The Lord Jesus Christ has taught us that no one is ever forgotten by Him."
Aroldo B. Cavalcante | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
